goals.active: Join the expedition to Orr's Royal Tombs.
goals.complete: Trahearne and I led a mission into Orr's Royal Tombs in an attempt to cast the ritual that will cleanse the land of Zhaitan's corruption. We got results, but the results didn't last. We realized we needed to cast the ritual in a different location known as the Source of Orr, and so we set out to find this location.
